'''Genshin Impact x HeyTea {{zh|喜茶}}''' is a collaborative effort between ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' creators [[miHoYo]] and the Chinese tea drink chain {{w|Hey Tea}}.<br/>

==Collaborations==
To date, there has been '''1''' collaboration between ''Genshin Impact'' and HeyTea {{zh|喜茶}}.

===Kamisato Siblings Merchandise===
This collaboration features various HeyTea {{zh|喜茶}} drinks and merchandise, with a custom theme centred around [[Kamisato Ayaka]] and [[Kamisato Ayato]].<br/>
Other physical merchandise includes:
* HeyTea {{zh|喜茶}} styled Kamisato siblings standee
* HeyTea {{zh|喜茶}} Kamisato Ayato styled drinks cup
* HeyTea {{zh|喜茶}} Kamisato siblings styled drinks bottles
* HeyTea {{zh|喜茶}} special drinks with names and styles representing each of the Kamisato siblings:
** {{Lang|'''Ayato – Hydro Illusion Longan Coconut Water'''|zh=绫人·水影龙眼椰|zh_rm=}}
** {{Lang|'''Ayaka – Frosting Longan Coconut Smoothie'''|zh=绫华·寒霜龙眼椰|zh_rm=}}
